page.title: 17VILLAGE POLICEMAN,LEASINGHAM
page.content: The two{police constables}responsible for{Leasingham}have many villages to patrol.Their area covers Cranwell, Leasingham,North and South Rauceby, Silk Willoughby,Osbournby along the A52 and all smaller villages from Cranwell down to Osbournby. Each day is different for a rural policeman and may include{liaison}with other forces,{checking on firearms with local farmers or developing {"police /pupil relationships",}through cycling proficiency or assisting in projects. They may be called to a road traffic accident,or be the first officer on the scene of a house burglary. The{favourite part}of our rural policeman's duties is work with {children}and community relations in general,which he finds{"most {rewarding"}as efforts are appreciated.
